body:
1. Enter your username, press fetch to return your list of albums
2. Select the albums you own
3. Buy any albums you don't own
4. goto 2.
tagline: Get a list of your favourite albums that you have yet to buy (via Last.fm)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: PutYourMoneyWhereYourEarsAre
